articles.title: World's largest fried cake cooked up at festival in Argentina
articles.description: Organizers of a festival in Argentina said they broke a Guinness World Record by cooking up a fried cake measuring about 16 feet in diameter.
articles.content:
April 13 (UPI) -- Organizers of a festival in Argentina said they broke a Guinness World Record by cooking up a fried cake measuring about 16 feet in diameter.
The 22nd Provincial Fried Cake Festival in Mercedes featured the creation of a massive fri... [333 chars]

articles.title: In Argentina, polo players participate in first-ever women’s world cup
articles.description: Six teams from Argentina, the United States, England, Ireland, Brazil, and Italy are competing in the world cup.
articles.content:
Earlier this week, Argentina started the first-ever Women’s Polo World Cup. The much-awaited tournament is being seen as a marker of progress for women players as polo has always been considered a male-dominated sport.
Women’s teams from six countrie... [1906 chars]

articles.title: With Argentine inflation seen topping 6%, a bricklayer struggles to survive
articles.description: José Luis Rodríguez, a bricklayer in Argentina, cannot get by on his paycheck anymore with inflation set to have climbed more than 6% in March alone, the highest level in years, as spiraling food and fuel prices dent the value of salaries and savings.
articles.content:
A customer looks at bottles of alcohol in a market as inflation in Argentina hits its highest level in years, causing food prices to spiral, in Buenos Aires, Argentina April 12, 2022. REUTERS/Mariana Nedelcu

articles.title: In Argentina, the mecca of polo, women swing mallets in first World Cup
articles.description: Some of the world's top women polo players compete this week in Argentina in the sport's first-ever female World Cup, the culmination of years of growing opportunity in a game known for its equestrian allure and high-society sensibilities.
